rows.label: qst001901_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah... why did I accept
a job like this, mo?

rows.label: qst001901_msg0002
rows.name: It's hopeless, mo. It's all over, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0003
rows.name:
The job I took from a
Superbian was an impossible
task, basically a scam, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0004
rows.name:
Sekaka is facing the biggest crisis
of his salvaging career, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0005
rows.name: I was blinded by the reward, mo...

rows.label: qst001901_msg0006
rows.name:
I accepted the job without checking
the details properly, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0007
rows.name:
I thought that as Sekaka, the
Mushroom-Feast Salvager, I could
get anything with ease...

rows.label: qst001901_msg0008
rows.name:
But the items required weren't
just things you could get
from salvaging, mo...

rows.label: qst001901_msg0009
rows.name:
Some of them could only be
obtained by a Driver, mo...

rows.label: qst001901_msg0010
rows.name:
If I don't finish by the deadline
or break the contract, I'll have
to pay a huge penalty fee, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0011
rows.name:
And the Superbian client is so scary,
so scary... I'm trembling, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0012
rows.name:
Ah, I'm sure I won't be
able to finish this, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0013
rows.name:
I'll be sunk into the Cloud
Sea to pay the huge penalty
with my insurance money, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0014
rows.name:
That's a great help, mo. I can see
a faint glimmer of hope now, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0015
rows.name: The contract Sekaka signed requires...

rows.label: qst001901_msg0016
rows.name:
here in the Liberalitas
Archipelago, 14 Energy
Aubergines, 5 Border Sapphires...

rows.label: qst001901_msg0017
rows.name:
and also 20 Angel Engines
need to be salvaged, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0018
rows.name: Ah, but don't worry, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0019
rows.name:
I've managed to get 18 Angel
Engines from salvaging, so
there are only 2 left, mo.

rows.label: qst001901_msg0020
rows.name:
It's a lot of rare items and large
quantities, so it's very tough,
but please do your best, mo.
